maturity_schedule.description: Must extract the complete debt maturity schedule with correct amounts for each year as disclosed in the source document.

total_debt.description: Must correctly state the total long-term debt that reconciles with the maturity schedule.

units.description: Must correctly identify the units of measurement (thousands, millions) and currency.

source_location.description: Must identify the specific footnote and/or page where the debt maturity schedule was found.

methodology.description: Must describe a logical approach to locating and extracting the debt maturity data.
